ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc71:1.1_0: At one time when the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc71:1.2_0: At that time the nuns were giving the full admission to unmarried girls less than twenty years old.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc71:1.3_0: From the touch of flies, mosquitoes, wind, sun, and reptiles. They endure rude and unwelcome criticism.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc71:1.4_0: and they were unable to bear up with bodily feelings that are painful, severe, sharp, and destructive of life.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc71:1.5_0: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized her,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc71:1.6_0: “How can nuns give the full admission to unmarried girls less than twenty years old?” ...
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc71:1.7_0: “Is it true, monks, that nuns do this?”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc71:1.11_0: An unmarried girl less than twenty years old is unable to endure cold and heat; hunger and thirst; contact with horseflies, mosquitoes, wind, the burning sun, and creeping animals and insects; rude and unwelcome speech;
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc71:1.12_0: and she’s unable to bear up with bodily feelings that are painful, severe, sharp, and destructive of life.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc71:1.13_0: But unmarried girls who are twenty years old is able to endure these things.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc71:1.14_0: and she’s unable to bear up with bodily feelings that are painful, severe, sharp, and destructive of life.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc71:1.15_0: This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it ...”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc71:1.16_0: “And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule like this:
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc71:1.17.1_0: ‘If a nun gives the full admission to an unmarried girl who is less than twenty years old, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc71:2.4_0: ...The nun who has been given the full ordination by both Sanghas through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc71:2.6_0: who has not reached twenty years of age.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc71:2.8_0: a novice nun is what is meant.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc71:2.11_0: If, intending to give full admission, she searches for a group, a teacher, a bowl, or a robe, or she establishes a monastic boundary, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc71:2.12_0: After the motion, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc71:2.13_0: After each of the first two announcements, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc71:2.14_0: When the last announcement is finished, the preceptor commits an offense entailing confession,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc71:2.15_0: and the group and the teacher commit an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc71:2.16.1_0: If the girl is less than twenty years old, but she perceives her as less, and she gives her the full admission, she commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc71:2.17_0: If the girl is less than twenty years old, but she is unsure of it, and she gives her the full admission, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc71:2.18_0: If the girl is less than twenty years old, but she perceives her as more, and she gives her the full admission, there is no offense.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc71:2.19_0: If the girl is more than twenty years old, but she perceives her as less, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc71:2.20_0: If the girl is more than twenty years old, but she is unsure of it, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc71:2.21_0: If the girl is more than twenty years old, and she perceives her as more, there is no offense.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc71:2.22.1_0: there is no offense for him.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc71:2.23_0: if she gives the full admission to a girl less than twenty years old, but she perceives her as more;
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc71:2.24_0: if she gives the full admission to a girl more than twenty years old, and she perceives her as more;
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc71:2.26_0: if she is the first offender.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc71:2.27_0: The first training rule is finished.
